name: py-oslo-serialization
description:
The oslo.serialization library provides support for representing
objects in transmittable and storable formats, such as Base64, JSON and
MessagePack.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pbr
dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

dependencies.name: py-oslo-utils
dependencies.description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team
